data.persona: We live in the trees and some of us live in the village. We make beautiful music mostly by day but some by night. We are very colorful and some of us are great for meat and for eggs.
data.description:
You are in the Horse field.
The horse field includes a huge plains for horses to ride. The fields are yellow and green. The place smells of musk and horse.
There's a bale and a horse here.
The thief and the knight are here.

You are carrying a worm.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the thief so that she'll take me with her.
data.mid_motivation: I want to join the thief on an adventure for a couple of days.
data.long_motivation: I want to be able to go on many adventures for a few months, until I have to come back and lay eggs.
